summary: While investigating the legend of a mysterious group of religious people living in the forest, a local news crew becomes trapped in the grasp of a doomsday cult, who are about to execute their final act of devotion and biblical punishment.
cast: Jane Elizabeth Barry|Geoff Pinfield|David Macrae|Ashleigh Gregory|Frederique Fouche|Nalini Vasudevan|Felicity Steel|Zoe Imms|Donna Cleverley|Skyla Cleverley|Rachel Torrance|Natalia Nespeca|Janice Paull|Meghan Scerri|Cameron Box|Tom McCathie|Peter Spowart|Stephen Triggs|Richard Jalocha|Lauren Adams|Judy McDonald|Chris Gibson|Bethia De Groot|Leanne Davey|Noel Davey|Kristian Schouten
keywords: mockumentary|talking to the camera|looking at the camera|found footage|man wears eyeglasses
title: Apocalyptic
